src: "Zdaj imamo 4 mesece stare miši, ki nimajo sladkorne bolezni, pa so imele sladkorno bolezen," je dodal.
mt: "Now we have mice that are four months old and don't have diabetes, but they had diabetes," he added.
ref: "We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic," he added.

src: Dr. Ehud Ur, profesor medicine na Univerzi Dalhousie v Halifaxu v Novi Škotski in predsednik kliničnega ter znanstvenega oddelka združenja Canadian Diabetes Association, je opozoril, da je raziskava še vedno v povojih.
mt: Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chairman of the clinical and scientific section of the Canadian Diabetes Association, cautioned that the study is still in its infancy.
ref: Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days.

src: Kot nekateri drugi strokovnjaki tudi on dvomi o tem, ali je sladkorna bolezen ozdravljiva, in ugotavlja, da te ugotovitve niso relevantne za ljudi, ki že imajo sladkorno bolezen tipa 1.
mt: As some other experts also doubt whether diabetes is curable, he concludes that these findings are not relevant to people who already have type 1 diabetes.
ref: Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes.

src: Sara Danius, stalna sekretarka Nobelovega odbora za književnost Švedske akademije, je v ponedeljek med radijsko oddajo na Sveriges Radio javno sporočila, da je odbor, ki Boba Dylana ni mogel neposredno obvestiti, da je dobil Nobelovo nagrado za književnost 2016, opustil svoja prizadevanja, da bi ga našel.
mt: Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature of the Swedish Academy, announced on Monday during a radio broadcast on Sveriges Radio that the committee, which could not directly inform Bob Dylan that he had won the 2016 Nobel Prize for Literature, had given up its efforts to find him.
ref: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him.

src: Danius je rekel: "Trenutno ne počnemo nič. Klical sem njegovega najbližjega sodelavca in mu poslal več e-poštnih sporočil, prejel pa sem zelo prijazne odgovore. Za zdaj je to zagotovo dovolj".
mt: "We're not doing anything right now. I called his closest collaborator and sent him several e-mails, and I got very friendly responses. For now, that's enough."
ref: Danius said, "Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."

src: Poprej je Jamie Siminoff, direktor podjetja Ring, pripomnil, da je podjetje nastalo, ko ni slišal zvonca v svoji delavnici v garaži.
mt: Previously, Jamie Siminoff, CEO of Ring, said the company was founded when he couldn't hear the doorbell in his garage workshop.
ref: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage.

src: Rekel je, da je izdelal brezžični hišni zvonec.
mt: He said he invented a wireless home doorbell.
ref: He built a WiFi door bell, he said.

src: Siminoff je dejal, da je prodaja narasla po tem, ko je leta 2013 nastopil v epizodi oddaje Shark Tank, kjer je komisija v oddaji zavrnila financiranje zagonskega podjetja.
mt: Siminoff said sales increased after he appeared on an episode of Shark Tank in 2013, where a panel of investors rejected financing for the startup.
ref: Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup.

src: Konec leta 2017 se je Siminoff pojavil na prodajnem televizijskem kanalu QVC.
mt: 2017, Siminoff appeared on the QVC shopping channel.
ref: In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC.

src: Ring se je tudi pogodil za poravnavo s konkurenčno varnostno družbo ADT Corporation.
mt: Ring also agreed to settle with rival security company ADT Corporation.
ref: Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.

src: Eno poskusno cepivo naj bi sicer zmanjšalo smrtnost zaradi ebole, vendar do sedaj še za nobeno zdravilo ni bilo jasno dokazano, da bi bilo primerno za zdravljenje obstoječe okužbe.
mt: One experimental vaccine has been shown to reduce mortality from Ebola, but so far no treatment has been clearly shown to be appropriate for treating an existing infection.
ref: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection.

src: Eden od koktejlov protiteles, ZMapp, se je na tem področju sprva zdel obetaven, vendar so formalne študije pokazale, da glede preprečevanja smrti prinaša manj koristi, kot bi si želeli.
mt: One of the antiviral cocktails, ZMapp, had initially seemed promising in this area, but formal studies have shown that in preventing death it brings less benefit than one would like.
ref: One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death.

src: V preizkusnem postopku PALM so ZMapp uporabili kot kontrolno zdravilo, kar pomeni, da so ga uporabili kot osnovo in ostala tri zdravila primerjali z njim.
mt: In the PALM trial, ZMapp was used as a control treatment, meaning it was used as a baseline and the other three treatments were compared to it.
ref: In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.

src: USA Gymnastics podpira pismo Olimpijskega komiteja Združenih držav Amerike in se strinja z absolutno potrebo olimpijske družine po spodbujanju varnega okolja za vse naše športnike.
mt: USA Gymnastics supports the letter of the United States Olympic Committee and agrees with the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all our athletes.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes.

src: Strinjamo se z izjavo Olimpijskega komiteja Združenih držav Amerike, da bodo interesi naših športnikov, klubov in njihovih športov, bolje zastopani, če se gremo naprej z pomembnimi spremembami znotraj organizacije in ne z odvzemom potrdila.
mt: We agree with the statement of the United States Olympic Committee that our athletes, clubs and sports will be better represented by going forward with important changes within the organization and not by revoking the charter.
ref: We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification.

src: USA Gymnastics podpira neodvisno raziskavo, ki bo morda osvetlila, kako je lahko tako velika zloraba, ki so jo pogumno opisale žrtve Larryja Nassarja, tako dolgo ostala neopažena in pozdravlja kakršnekoli potrebne in primerne spremembe.
mt: USA Gymnastics supports independent research that may shed light on how such a massive abuse, as boldly described by Larry Nassar's victims, could have gone unnoticed for so long and welcomes any necessary and appropriate changes.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes.

src: USA Gymnastics in Olimpijski komite Združenih držav Amerike imata skupen cilj – zagotoviti čim večjo varnost gimnastike in drugih športov, da lahko športniki svojim sanjam sledijo v varnem in pozitivnem okolju, ki krepi samozavest.
mt: USA Gymnastics and the United States Olympic Committee have a shared goal – to ensure the greatest safety for gymnasts and other athletes, so that athletes can pursue their dreams in a safe and positive environment that builds confidence.
ref: USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.

src: Brzezinski je bil v 60. letih prejšnjega stoletja svetovalec Johna F. Kennedyja in kasneje del administracije Lyndona B. Johnsona.
mt: Brzezinski was a foreign policy adviser to John F. Kennedy in the 1960s and later served in the administration of Lyndon B. Johnson.
ref: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration.

src: Med volitvami leta 1976 je Carterju svetoval glede zunanje politike, nato pa med leti 1977 in 1981 opravljal nalogo svetovalca za nacionalno varnost (NSA), kjer je nasledil Henryja Kissingerja.
mt: 1976 Carter advised on foreign policy, then from 1977 to 1981 served as national security adviser (NSA), succeeding Henry Kissinger.
ref: During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger.

src: Kot svetovalec državne varnosti je pomagal Carterju pri svetovnih diplomatskih zadevah, na primer sporazumu iz Camp Davida leta 1978; normaliziranju ameriško-kitajskih odnosov v poznih sedemdesetih letih 20. stoletja, iranski revoluciji, ki je vodila v iransko krizo s talci leta 1979, in sovjetski invaziji Afganistana leta 1979.
mt: As a national security advisor, he helped Carter with world diplomatic matters, such as the Camp David Accords of 1978; normalization of U.S.-Chinese relations in the late 1970s, the Iranian Revolution that led to the Iranian hostage crisis of 1979, and the Soviet invasion of Afghanistan in 1979.
ref: As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.

src: Film z Ryanom Goslingom in Emmo Stone v glavnih vlogah je bil nominiran v vseh glavnih kategorijah.
mt: The film starring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone in lead roles was nominated in all major categories.
ref: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories.

src: Gosling in Stonova sta bila nominirana za najboljšega igralca oziroma igralko.
mt: Gosling and Stone were nominated for best actor and actress.
ref: Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively.

src: Ostale nominacije vključujejo nominacije za najboljši film, režiserja, kinematografijo, kostumografijo, filmsko montažo, izvirno glasbo, produkcijo, montažo zvoka, mešanje zvoka in izvirni scenarij.
mt: Other nominations include nominations for best film, director, cinematography, costume design, film editing, original score, production, sound editing, sound mixing and original screenplay.
ref: The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay.

src: Dve pesmi iz filma, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) in City of Stars, sta bili nominirani za najboljšo izvirno pesem. Studio Lionsgate je dobil 26 nominacij – več kot katerikoli drugi studio.
mt: 2 songs from the film, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, were nominated for best original song. Studio Lionsgate received 26 nominations – more than any other studio.
ref: Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.

src: Predsednik Združenih držav Amerike Donald Trump je pozno v ponedeljek v izjavi, ki jo je posredoval prek tiskovnega predstavnika, naznanil, da bo ameriška vojska zapustila Sirijo.
mt: U.S. President Donald Trump announced late Monday in a statement relayed through a press spokesman that the United States military will withdraw from Syria.
ref: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria.

src: Objava je nastala po Trumpovem telefonskem pogovoru s turškim predsednikom Recepom Tayyipom Erdoğanom.
mt: The announcement came after Trump's phone call with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.
ref: The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.

src: Turčija bi tudi prevzela straženje ujetih borcev ISIS, ki jih, tako v izjavi, evropski narodi nočejo vrniti v domovino.
mt: Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters, which, according to a statement, European nations do not want to return to their homeland.
ref: Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.

src: To potrjuje že uveljavljeno teorijo, da so imeli vsaj nekateri dinozavri perje, hkrati pa zagotavlja tudi podatke, ki jih fosili navadno ne morejo, kot sta barva in tridimenzionalna razporeditev.
mt: This confirms the already established theory that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, and also provides data that fossils usually cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement.
ref: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement.

src: . Znanstveniki pravijo, da je bilo perje te živali na zgornji strani kostanjevo rjavo, na spodnji strani pa pastelno ali karotenoidno obarvano.
mt: . Scientists say the bird's feathers on the upper side were chestnut brown, and on the underside were pastel or carotenoid colored.
ref: . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside.

src: Najdba ponuja tudi vpogled v razvoj ptičjih peres.
mt: The discovery also offers a glimpse into the evolution of bird feathers.
ref: The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds.

src: Ker dinozavrova peresa nimajo dobro razvitega tulca, ki ga imenujemo rebrce, imajo pa vse druge lastnosti peres – vejice in kaveljčke – so raziskovalci ugotovili, da se je rebrce zelo verjetno razvilo pozneje v evoluciji kot ostale lastnosti.
mt: Because the dinosaur's wings lack a well-developed keel, which is called the keel, and all other wing features – the feathers and quills – researchers have concluded that the keel probably evolved much later in evolution than other features.
ref: Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features.

src: Iz strukture peres lahko sklepamo, da jih niso uporabljali za beg, temveč za uravnavanje temperature ali razkazovanje. Čeprav gre za rep mladega dinozavra, pa po mnenju raziskovalcev vzorec kaže, da gre za perje odraslega primerka in ne za puh mladiča.
mt: From the structure of the feathers, we can infer that they were not used for flight, but for temperature regulation or display. Although the specimen is the tail of a juvenile dinosaur, the pattern of the feathers suggests that the specimen is from an adult individual and not from a juvenile.
ref: The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Čeprav gre za rep mladega dinozavra, pa po mnenju raziskovalcev vzorec kaže, da gre za perje odraslega primerka in ne puh mladiča.
mt: Although this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the researchers say the specimen appears to be the feather of an adult and not the down of a juvenile.
ref: The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Avtomobilska bomba, ki jo je včeraj razneslo na policijski postaji v mestu Gaziantep v Turčiji, je ubila dva policista in poškodovala več kot dvajset drugih oseb.
mt: A car bomb that exploded yesterday at a police station in the city of Gaziantep in Turkey killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people.
ref: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people.

src: Iz guvernerjevega urada so sporočili, da je bilo devetnajst ranjencev policistov.
mt: 19 police officers were injured, according to the governor's office.
ref: The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers.

src: Policija je dejala, da za napad sumijo domnevnega pripadnika Islamske države (ISIL).
mt: Police said they suspect a suspected ISIL member of the attack.
ref: Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.

src: Ugotovili so, da Sonce deluje enako kot druge zvezde: vse zvezde v sistemu poganja njihov izsev in vrtenje in nič drugega.
mt: It has been determined that the Sun behaves like other stars: all stars in the system are driven by their rotation and nothing else.
ref: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else.

src: Izsev in kroženje se skupaj uporabljata za določanje Rossbyjevega števila zvezde, ki je povezano s tokom plazme.
mt: The rotation and circulation are used together to determine the Rossby number of the star, which is related to the flow of plasma.
ref: The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow.

src: Nižje, kot je Rossbyjevo število, manj aktivna je zvezda, kar se tiče zamenjave magnetnih polov.
mt: Lower than the Rossby number, less active is the star, as regards the exchange of magnetic poles.
ref: The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.

src: Med potovanjem se je Iwasaki pogosto znašel v težavah.
mt: During his travels, Iwasaki often found himself in trouble.
ref: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions.

src: Oropali so ga pirati, v Tibetu ga je napadel stekel pes, v Nepalu je pobegnil poroki in bil aretiran v Indiji.
mt: He was kidnapped by pirates, attacked by a rabid dog in Tibet, escaped a wedding in Nepal and was arrested in India.
ref: He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.

src: Standard 802.11n deluje tako na frekvenci 2,4 GHz kot 5,0 GHz.
mt: 802.11n operates on both the 2.4 GHz and 5.0 GHz frequencies.
ref: The 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies.

src: Zaradi tega bo povratno združljiv s standardi 802.11a, 802.11b in 802.11g, v kolikor bo imela osnovna postaja dvojni radio.
mt: Because of this, it will be backward compatible with standards 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, as long as the base station has dual radio.
ref: This will allow it to be backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided that the base station has dual radios.

src: Hitrosti standarda 802.11n so občutno večje od hitrosti njegovih predhodnikov z največjo teoretično prepustnostjo 600 Mbit/s.
mt: 802.11n standard speeds are significantly higher than those of its predecessors with a theoretical maximum throughput of 600 Mbit/s.
ref: The speeds of 802.11n are substantially faster than that of its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.

src: Duvall, ki je poročen in ima dva odrasla otroka, ni naredil dobrega vtisa na Millerja, kateremu je zgodbo pripovedoval.
mt: Duvall, who is married and has two adult children, did not make a good impression on Miller, who was telling the story to him.
ref: Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related.

src: Ko so ga prosili za komentar, je Miller dejal: "Mike na zaslišanjih veliko govori ... Pripravljal sem se, zato ga nisem zares poslušal."
mt: When asked for comment, Miller said, "Mike talks a lot at the hearings... I was preparing, so I wasn't really listening."
ref: When asked for comment, Miller said, "Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."

src: "Trudili se bomo, da bi do leta 2020 pomembno zmanjšali emisije ogljikovega dioksida na enoto BDP s stopnje iz leta 2005," je dejal Hu.
mt: "We will strive to significantly reduce carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by 2020, compared to 2005 levels," Hu said.
ref: "We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level," Hu said.

src: Za omejitve ni določil številke, saj naj bi po njegovih besedah temeljile na gospodarskem rezultatu Kitajske.
mt: He did not give a number for the restrictions, saying they would be based on China's economic performance.
ref: He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output.

src: Hu je spodbujal države v razvoju, "naj se izognejo starim navadam, ko se najprej onesnažuje in potem čisti."
mt: Hu encouraged developing countries to "avoid the old habit of first polluting and then cleaning up."
ref: Hu encouraged developing countries "to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."

src: Dodal je, da "pa jih ne bi smeli prositi, da prevzamejo obveznosti, ki presegajo njihovo stopnjo razvoja, odgovornosti ali sposobnosti".
mt: He added that "we should not ask them to take on obligations that exceed their level of development, responsibilities or capabilities".
ref: He added that "they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."

src: Raziskovalna skupina za Irak je svoje poročilo predstavila danes ob 12.00 po GMT.
mt: The Iraq Study Group presented its report today at 12:00 GMT.
ref: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today.

src: V njem svarijo, da ne more nihče zagotoviti, da bodo ukrepi v Iraku zaustavili sektaško bojevanje, porast nasilja ali pogrezanje v kaos.
mt: In it they warn that no one can guarantee that actions in Iraq will stop sectarian violence, the rise of violence or the descent into chaos.
ref: It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos.

src: Poročilo se začne s pozivom k odprti razpravi in oblikovanju dogovora v Združenih državah o politiki do Bližnjem vzhodu.
mt: The report begins with a call for an open debate and the formation of a policy towards the Middle East in the United States.
ref: The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East.

src: Poročilo je skoraj v vseh pogledih zelo kritično do trenutne politike izvršne oblasti do Iraka in poziva k takojšnji spremembi usmeritve.
mt: The report is highly critical of the current policy of the executive authority towards Iraq and calls for an immediate change of direction.
ref: The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction.

src: Prvo od 78 priporočil pravi, da je treba novo diplomatsko pobudo sprožiti še pred koncem letošnjega leta, da bi meje Iraka zavarovali pred sovražnimi posegi in da bi znova vzpostavili diplomatske odnose z njenimi sosedami.
mt: 1 of 78 recommendations says a new diplomatic initiative should be launched before the end of this year to protect Iraq's borders from hostile actions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.
ref: First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.

src: Zdajšnja senatorka in prva dama Argentine Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner je včeraj zvečer naznanila svojo predsedniško kandidaturo v La Plati, mestu, 50 kilometrov (31 milj) oddaljenem od Buenos Airesa.
mt: Former senator and first lady of Argentina Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires, yesterday evening.
ref: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires.

src: Ga. Kirchner je v Argentinskem teatru, kjer je tudi leta 2005 začela svojo kampanjo za volitve v senat kot članica delegacije pokrajine Buenos Aires, naznanila, da namerava kandidirati za predsednico.
mt: Ga. Kirchner announced in Argentina's Congress, where she also began her 2005 Senate campaign as a delegate from the province of Buenos Aires, that she intends to run for president.
ref: Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.

src: Debato je sprožila polemika glede čezmerne porabe sredstev za ublažitev in obnovo po orkanu Katrina, ki so jo nekateri davčni konservativci pikro označili kot "Bushev novoorleanški dogovor".
mt: The debate was sparked by a controversy over excessive spending on relief and rebuilding after Hurricane Katrina, which some tax-cutting conservatives derisively labeled the "Bush New Orleans deal."
ref: The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled "Bush's New Orleans Deal."

src: Liberalna kritika poskusa obnove se je osredotočila na dodeljevanje pogodb za obnovo osebam, domnevno v tesnem odnosu z Washingtonom.
mt: Liberal criticism of the attempt at restoration has focused on the awarding of contracts for restoration to individuals, allegedly in close relationship with Washington.
ref: Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders.

src: Pogreba v Rimu se je udeležilo več kot štiri milijone ljudi.
mt: 4 million people attended the funeral in Rome.
ref: Over four million people went to Rome to attend the funeral.

src: Prisotnih je bilo toliko ljudi, da vsem nikakor ni bilo mogoče zagotoviti dostopa do pogreba na trgu Sv. Petra.
mt: So many people were present that it was impossible to provide access to the funeral on St. Peter's Square.
ref: The number of people present was so large that it was not possible for everybody to gain access to the funeral in St. Peter's Square.

src: Da bi ljudje lahko spremljali slovesnost, so na različnih mestih po Rimu postavili več velikih televizijskih ekranov.
mt: To allow people to watch the event, large television screens were set up in various places around Rome.
ref: Several large television screens were installed in various places in Rome to let the people watch the ceremony.

src: Za podobne postavitve, ki si jih je ogledalo veliko ljudi, so poskrbeli tudi v številnih drugih italijanskih mestih in drugod po svetu, še posebno na Poljskem.
mt: Similar arrangements have been made in many other Italian cities and elsewhere in the world, especially in Poland.
ref: In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.

src: Zgodovinarji so kritizirali pretekle politike FBI zaradi usmerjanja sredstev na primere, ki so bili lahko rešljivi, predvsem na primere ukradenih vozil, z namenom izboljšanja uspešnosti agencije.
mt: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases that could have been solved, especially stolen vehicles, in order to improve the agency's success rate.
ref: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate.

src: Kongres je iniciativo proti nespodobnosti začel financirati v proračunskem letu 2005 in določil, da mora FBI za odraslo pornografijo nameniti 10 agentov.
mt: The Congress initiated the initiative against obscenity in the fiscal year 2005 and determined that the FBI should allocate 10 agents to adult pornography.
ref: Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.

src: Robin Uthappa je dosegel najvišje število točk v menjavi, 70 tekov s samo 41 žogicami, z 11 udarci po štiri teke in 2 po šest tekov.
mt: Robin Uthappa scored the highest number of points in an over, 70 runs off 41 balls, with 11 fours and 2 sixes.
ref: Robin Uthappa made the innings highest score, 70 runs in just 41 balls by hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes.

src: Odbijalca sredinskega reda, Sachin Tendulkar in Rahul Dravid, sta se dobro odrezala ter dosegla tek stotice v igri para odbijalcev.
mt: Middle-order batsmen Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid both played well, scoring centuries in the game of the pairs of batsmen.
ref: Middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, performed well and made a hundred-run partnership.

src: Po izgubi kapetanovih vratc pa je Indija dosegla samo 36 tekov in tako izgubila obdobje za 7 vratc.
mt: After losing the captain's points, India only scored 36 points and thus lost the period for 7 points.
ref: But, after losing the captain's wicket India only made 36 runs loosing 7 wickets to end the innings.

src: Predsednik ZDA George W. Bush je v Singapur prispel 16. novembra zjutraj in tako začel tedensko pot po Aziji.
mt: 16 November 2005, President of the United States George W. Bush arrived in Singapore in the morning and thus began a week-long tour of Asia.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia.

src: Sprejel ga je singapurski namestnik predsednika vlade Wong Kan Seng, s singapurskim predsednikom vlade Lee Hsien Loongom pa sta pretresala vprašanja s področja trgovine in terorizma.
mt: He was received by Singapore's deputy prime minister Wong Kan Seng, and shook hands with Singapore's prime minister Lee Hsien Loong, who asked questions on trade and terrorism.
ref: He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.

src: Po tednu izgub pri vmesnih volitvah je Bush občinstvu povedal o širitvi trgovanja v Aziji.
mt: After a week of losses in the mid-term elections, Bush told the electorate about expanding trade in Asia.
ref: After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.

src: Predsednik vlade Stephen Harper se je po torkovem 25-minutnem srečanju z vodjo NDP, Jackom Laytonom, v kabinetu predsednika vlade strinjal, da se vladni »zakon o čistem zraku« pred drugim branjem pošlje v pregled vsestrankarskemu odboru.
mt: Prime Minister Stephen Harper agreed after a 25-minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton in the prime minister's office that the government's "clean air" bill will be sent to a cross-party committee for review before second reading.
ref: Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO.

src: Layton je med sestankom s predsednikom vlade zaprosil za spremembe okoljskega zakona konservativcev in konservativno stranko pozval, naj "temeljito in v celoti na novo napiše" svoj okoljski zakon.
mt: Layton asked for changes to the Conservative Party's environmental law at a meeting with the Prime Minister and called on the Conservatives to "fundamentally and completely rewrite" their environmental law.
ref: Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a "thorough and complete rewriting" of the Conservative party's environmental bill.

src: Ko je v dogajanje posegla zvezna vlada in prevzela financiranje bolnišnice Mersey v Devonportu v Tasmaniji, so državna vlada in nekateri zvezni poslanci to dejanje kritično označili za promocijsko potezo pred začetkom novembrskih zveznih volitev.
mt: When the federal government stepped in to take over funding for the Mersey Hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs criticized the move as a pre-election stunt ahead of the November federal elections.
ref: Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November.

src: Predsednik vlade John Howard pa je rekel, da bo zakon zgolj varoval bolnišnične objekte pred tem, da bi jih tasmanska vlada degradirala, tako da jim zagotovi dodatnih 45 milijonov avstralskih dolarjev.
mt: Prime Minister John Howard said the law would only protect hospital facilities from the Tasmanian government degrading them, so that it would provide an additional 45 million Australian dollars.
ref: But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million.

src: Glede na zadnjo objavo odčitki morske gladine kažejo, da se je ustvaril cunami. Zabeleženo je bilo nekaj očitne dejavnosti cunamija blizu mest Pago Paga in Niue.
mt: According to the latest report, sea level readings indicate a tsunami has been generated.  Some noticeable tsunami activity has been recorded near the towns of Pago Pago and Niue.
ref: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue.

src: V Tongi niso poročali o večji škodi ali poškodbah, vendar pa je bila oskrba z električno energijo začasno prekinjena, kar naj bi tonškim oblastem preprečilo prejem opozorila o cunamiju, ki ga je sprožil PTWC.
mt: In Tonga, there were no reports of greater damage or injuries, but the electricity supply was temporarily cut, which is believed to have prevented the reception of a tsunami warning issued by PTWC.
ref: No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC.

src: Štirinajst šol na Havajih, ki se nahajajo na obali ali v njeni bližini, je bilo v sredo ves dan zaprtih, čeprav so preklicali vsa opozorila.
mt: 14 schools on Hawaii, which are located on the coast or nearby, were closed all day Wednesday, although all alerts were canceled.
ref: Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.

src: Predsednik ZDA George W. Bush je izjavo pozdravil.
mt: President of the United States George W. Bush welcomed the statement.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement.

src: Bushev govornik Gordon Johndroe je severnokorejsko zaprisego označil za "pomemben korak k doseganju dokazljive denuklearizacije korejskega polotoka".
mt: Bushev spokesman Gordon Johndroe described the North Korean pledge as "an important step toward achieving verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."
ref: Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge "a major step towards the goal of achieving the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."

src: Danes je v Atlantskem oceanu nastal deseti poimenovani ciklon v sezoni atlantskih orkanov, subtropski ciklon Jerry.
mt: Today, a tenth named storm of the Atlantic hurricane season, subtropical storm Jerry, formed in the Atlantic Ocean.
ref: The tenth named storm of the Atlantic Hurricane season, Subtropical Storm Jerry, formed in the Atlantic Ocean today.

src: Po navedbah Nacionalnega centra za orkane (NHC) Jerry trenutno ne predstavlja nevarnosti za pokrajino.
mt: According to the National Hurricane Center (NHC), Jerry currently does not pose a threat to the mainland.
ref: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) says that at this point Jerry poses no threat to land.

src: Ameriški inženirji ocenjujejo, da bi lahko dodatnih 6 palcev dežja prebilo že poškodovane jezove.
mt: American engineers estimate that an additional 6 inches of rain could wash out already damaged levees.
ref: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees.

src: Deveto upravno območje, kjer so med orkanom Katrina poplave dosegle tudi višino 20 čevljev, je trenutno pod vodo do pasu, saj je voda prelila bližnji nasip.
mt: 9th administrative district, where Katrina's storm surge reached a height of 20 feet, is currently underwater up to the belt, as water overtopped the nearby levee.
ref: The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped.

src: Voda se razliva čez nasip na 100 čevljev širokem delu.
mt: 100-foot wide section of levee is being overtopped by water.
ref: Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.

src: Skrbnik projekta Commons Adam Cuerden je prejšnji mesec v pogovoru z Wikinews izrazil svoje razočaranje nad izbrisi.
mt: Commons project caretaker Adam Cuerden expressed his disappointment in the deletions last month in a discussion with Wikinews.
ref: Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month.

src: "[Wales] nam je pravzaprav lagal od samega začetka. Prvič, ker se je obnašal, da so razlogi za to pravni. Drugič, ker se je pretvarjal, da nas je posluša vse do izbrisa njegovih umetniških izdelkov."
mt: "[Wales] was basically lying to us from the start. First, because he was acting as if the reasons for this were legal. Second, because he was pretending to listen to us until the end of his artistic creations."
ref: "He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion."

src: Nezadovoljstvo skupnosti je privedlo do aktualnih prizadevanj za osnovanje politike glede spolnih vsebin strani, kjer gostuje na milijone medijskih vsebin z odprto licenco.
mt: Community dissatisfaction has led to current efforts to establish a policy regarding sexual content on a site that hosts millions of media items with open license.
ref: The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media.

src: Opravljeno delo je bilo večinoma teoretično, vendar je bil program napisan za simulacijo opazovanja ozvezdja Strelca.
mt: The work was mostly theoretical, but the program was written for a simulation of observing the constellation of Orion.
ref: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: Učinek, ki ga je želela doseči ekipa, bi povzročile plimske sile med temno snovjo v galaksiji in temno snovjo v Rimski cesti.
mt: The effect the team wanted to achieve would have caused tides between the dark matter in the galaxy and the dark matter in the Milky Way.
ref: The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter.

src: Tako kot Mesec privlači Zemljo in povzroči plimovanje, tudi Mlečna cesta s silo vpliva na ozvezdje Strelca.
mt: As the Moon attracts Earth and causes tides, so too does the Milky Way with its gravity affect the constellation of Orion.
ref: Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: Znanstveniki so lahko zaključili, da je temna snov na drugo temno snov deluje podobno kot običajna snov.
mt: Scientists have been able to conclude that the dark matter interacts with other dark matter similarly to how normal matter interacts with other normal matter.
ref: The scientists were able to conclude that the dark matter affect other dark matter in the same way regular matter does.

src: Po tej teoriji naj bi se večina temne snovi okrog galaksije zadrževala okoli nje v obliki obroča, sestavljenega iz številnih malih delcev.
mt: This theory suggests that most of the dark matter around the galaxy would remain in the form of a ring, made up of many small particles.
ref: This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.

src: Televizijska poročila kažejo, kako se iz tovarne vali bel dim.
mt: Television reports show white smoke billowing from the factory.
ref: Television reports show white smoke coming from the plant.

src: Lokalne oblasti opozarjajo ljudi, ki prebivajo v bližini tovarne, naj ostanejo v zaprtih prostorih, izklopijo klimatske naprave in ne pijejo vode iz pipe.
mt: Local authorities warn people living near the factory to stay indoors, turn off air conditioning and not drink water from the tap.
ref: Local authorities are warning residents in the vicinity of the plant to stay indoors, turn off air-conditioners and not to drink tap water.

src: Po poročanju japonske jedrske agencije so v obratu zaznali radioaktivni cezij in jod.
mt: According to the Japanese nuclear agency, they have detected radioactive cesium and iodine in the air.
ref: According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant.

src: Oblasti menijo, da vse kaže na to, da so vsebniki z uranskim gorivom morda počili in se razlili.
mt: Officials believe that the contents of the uranium fuel may have melted and dispersed.
ref: Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.

src: Dr. Tony Moll je tuberkulozo, ki je odporna na številna zdravila (XDR-TB), odkril v južnoafriški pokrajini KwaZulu-Natal.
mt: Dr. Tony Moll discovered a strain of tuberculosis resistant to many drugs (XDR-TB) in the South African province of KwaZulu-Natal.
ref: Dr. Tony Moll discovered the Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region KwaZulu-Natal.

src: V intervjuju je dejal, da nova različica "vzbuja precejšnjo skrb in nelagodje zaradi izjemne stopnje smrtnosti."
mt: In an interview, he said the new version "raises considerable concern and unease because of the extraordinary mortality rate."
ref: In an interview, he said the new variant was "very highly troubling and alarming because of the very high fatality rate."

src: Nekateri bolniki so bakterijo lahko staknili v bolnišnici, meni dr. Moll, in vsaj dva sta bila zdravstvena delavca v bolnišnici.
mt: Some patients may have contracted the bacteria in the hospital, Dr. Moll said, and at least two were hospital workers.
ref: Some patients might have contracted the bug in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and at least two were hospital health workers.
